thread.title: Montreal in November - Weather and Event Guide
thread.title_full: Montreal in November - Weather and Event Guide

title: Montreal in November - Weather and Event Guide
text:
Temperatures can be cold in Montreal in November, but not necessarily unpleasant, especially if you're prepared.
November Weather in Montreal: Average November temperature: 7ºC / 45ºF November average high: 11ºC / 52ºF November average low: 1ºC / 30ºF Visitors can expect rain about 10 out of 30 days in November.
What to Pack for Montreal in November: 
Visitors to Montreal in November should be prepared for a variety of temperatures. Pack clothing that can be layered. Long sleeve shirts; sweaters / sweatshirts; jacket; long pants; closed-toe, comfortable shoes, boots. Umbrella 
Montreal in November Perks: Fewer tourists mean travel and hotel deals. For example, Hotel Omni often offers half price hotel deals . Try Travel Zoo Canada for more Canada travel deals. 
Good to Know about Montreal in November: Remembrance Day - November 11 - though not a general holiday is a bank holiday in Montreal and the rest of Quebec. Banks and government offices will be closed. Call ahead to double check the hours for any restaurants or stores you plan to visit 
Montreal in November - Events & Highlights: Santa Claus Parade : Proceeds along St-Catherine Street beginning at 11 am.
